files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Mills, Sara - Mid Term Program

#Variables
print ( "Planet Express Delivery Time Calculator")
planetName = input ( " What is the name of the planet? ")
parsecsAway = float ( input ( " How many parsecs away? ") )
numberPackages = float ( input ( " How many packages? ") )
weightPackages = float ( input ( " How many tons does each package weigh? ") )
totalWeight = float ( weightPackages*numberPackages )
timeBack = float ( parsecsAway*1 )
timeTo = float ( parsecsAway + ( totalWeight*parsecsAway) )
totalTime = float ( timeBack + timeTo )


#Calculation Restrictions 
          # parsecsAway >= 1... Error: planetName must more than one parsec away.
          # numberPackages >= 1... Error: The ship must carry at least one package.
          # weightPackages >= 1... Error: The package weight 0.0 is too light.
          # if numberPackages >10 must be even...Warning: Adjusting package count to 12 
                    #Before calculations
          # planetName = Robot Planet...Also, Bender is great! after calculations

if ( parsecsAway < 1 ):
    print ( "Error:", planetName , "must be one or more parsecs away.")
elif ( numberPackages < 1 ):
        print ( "Error: The ship must carry at least one package. ")
elif ( weightPackages < 0 ): 
        print ( "Error: The package weight " , weightPackages , " is too light.")
elif ( numberPackages > 10 and numberPackages % 2 != 0 ):
            numberPackages = int ( numberPackages + 1 )
            totalWeight = float ( weightPackages*numberPackages )
            timeBack = float ( parsecsAway*1 )
            timeTo = float ( parsecsAway + ( totalWeight*parsecsAway) )
            totalTime = float ( timeBack + timeTo )
            print ( "Warning: Adjusting package count to" , numberPackages)
            print ( " The total cargo weight is " , totalWeight , "tons." )
            print ( " The trip to " , planetName , " will take " , timeTo , "minutes.")
            print ( "The trip back to Earth will take " , timeBack , "minutes.")
            print ( " The total trip time is " , totalTime , "minutes." )
else:  
    print ( " The total cargo weight is " , totalWeight , "tons." )
    print ( " The trip to " , planetName , " will take " , timeTo , "minutes.")
    print ( "The trip back to Earth will take " , timeBack , "minutes.")
    print ( " The total trip time is " , totalTime , "minutes." )
    
if ( planetName == "Robot Planet"):
        print ( " Also , Bender is great! ")
